product_name: GODDESS GARDEN Sport Natural Sunscreen Spray SPF 30 - 3.4 fl. oz.
long_description: Great for all your outdoor activities, this mineral-based, non-aerosol spray with organic ingredients provides full-spectrum UVA and UVB sun protection and is sheer and non-whitening.
short_description: Great for all your outdoor activities, this mineral-based, non-aerosol spray with organic ingredients provides full-spectrum UVA and UVB sun protection and is sheer and non-whitening.
